response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. Given its high quality and versatile applications, I estimate its value to be well above $15,000. Considering its unique benefits and the potential return on investment, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $20,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your business goals. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 20000}
